topdown

Class PlayerSupplies

  • java.lang.Object
    • topdown.GameObject
      • topdown.PlayerSupplies

  • public class PlayerSupplies
extends GameObject
    Class used to create and place supplies that the user/player can use.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Isaac Jimenez, Nicholas English, Suman Gurung

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      Holds the size of the supply object.
      private Type type
      Holds the type of supply the object is.
      private int wait
      Holds the time the supply may use.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerSupplies

        public PlayerSupplies(int x,
                      int y,
                      Type type,
                      Handler handle,
                      Game game)
        Constructor creates a supply object by accepting in various parameters needed to determine the properties of the supply.
        Parameters:
        x - represents the x coordinate at which the supply will spawn.
        y - represents the y coordinate at which the supply will spawn.
        type - represents the type of object.
        handle - represents the instance of the Handler class being passed down to this constructor.
        game - represents the instance of the Game class being passed down to this constructor.
